{"id":417191462,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 1 month","timestamp":1604611668,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/417191462/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxPower(string s) {\n        if(s.size() == 1) return 1;\n        int e = 1;\n        std::vector<int> freq;\n        for(size_t idx = 0; idx + 1 < s.size(); idx++){\n            if(s[idx] == s[idx + 1]){\n                e++;\n            }else{\n                freq.push_back(e);\n                e = 1;\n            }\n        }\n        freq.push_back(e);\n        return *std::max_element(freq.begin(), freq.end());\n       \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
